summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the allley in block 32, D.T. Denny's Home Addition; being the alley from Harrison Street to Republican Street, between 1st Avenue North and Warren Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 112736 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
